org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.statetracker.hazelcast

Class HazelCastStateTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.statetracker.hazelcast.BaseHazelCastStateTracker
      • org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.statetracker.hazelcast.HazelCastStateTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, StateTracker

    @Path(value="/statetracker")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public class HazelCastStateTracker
extends BaseHazelCastStateTracker
    Tracks state of workers and jobs via hazelcast distributed data structures
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
